Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are eventually followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that occur in variants containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are not followed by any rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, etc.)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that lead to a successful Payment Handled without any intermediate rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are directly followed by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are part of variants where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER appears at least once
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE leading to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER over those leading to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE grouped by case:BudgetNumber
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are resubmissions (i.e., preceded by any Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that include more than one submission due to prior rejections
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that result in a completed process (ending with Payment Handled) within the same variant
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are followed by Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of total rejections attributed to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER relative to all submissions (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE per case that experiences at least one Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE with case:Amount above 100 euros that are later rejected by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that bypass the PRE_APPROVER role entirely (i.e., go directly to ADMINISTRATION or SUPERVISOR)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Fraction of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are immediately followed by a rejection from any actor, specifically highlighting the share due to PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that initiate a variant ending in Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER without subsequent resubmission
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE made in 2018 compared to 2017
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases
